personalInfo.splInterest: Playing the drums, hanging with family and friends, working out, staying active

tourBios.carHigh: Played in three Web.com Tour events in 2010, making one cut, resulting in a T14 at the Chitimacha Louisiana Open...Was the 2009 Adams Tour Rookie of the Year. Though winless, he only missed one cut and had a T3 and two T4s in a four-week span in March and April.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the Mississippi 5A state title and the Mississippi Junior...Won 5A district title twice and regionals once...Was the 2006 Southland Conference Player of the Year...Was a first-team all-conference three years (2006-08)...Won two collegiate events (the University of Central Florida Invitational and the Gopher Invitational)...Was a semifinalist at the 2007 U.S. Amateur...Was ranked in the top 20 of the World Amateur Golf Ranking.
tourBios.personal: Attended Cinco Ranch High School in Katy, Texas...If not a professional golfer, would probably be a musician...Favorite course played is Cypress Point...Favorite college team is LSU and pro team the Houston Texans...Favorite TV show is "The Office" and favorite movies are "The Shawshank Redemption" and "Anchorman,"...Favorite band is Band of Heathens...Favorite foods are chicken and rice, Japanese and sushi...Favorite athlete is Andre Johnson...Favorite areas are Palm Springs and San Diego...Would like to trade places with Tiger Woods for one day "To see what he goes through in a day...practice, media, etc."...Personal motto is "Discipline is doing something you don't want to do when you don't want to do it."...Bucket list includes sky diving...Gravitated to golf having "grown tired of getting mad at other players on my team in soccer, baseball and football. There is no one to blame but me in golf."

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T14th in 2010 at the Chitimacha Louisiana Open.
